name: The War Inside
description:
In a city plagued by a civil war,  one man tries to figure out where he stands on it - and if he won't go to the fight, the fight will come to his door. 

---

A game developed by a GameDevTecnico team for the NaNoRenO 2022 Jam. 

Ivo Duarte

Julia Pinheiro (Dyulai)

Mafalda Carvalhal 

Tomaz Silva

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
